import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' const NavBar =()=>{ const API_URL = 'https://api.themoviedb.org/3' const API_KEY = 'c470ed460ab8e34d41a15eb2c5e77dfa' const [searchKey, setSearchKey] = useState('') const [movies, setMovies] = useState([]) const [movie, setMovie] = useState({ title: 'Loading Movies' }) const fetchMovies = async (searchKey) => { const type = searchKey ? 'search' : 'discover' const { data: { results }, } = await axios.get(`${API_URL}/${type}/movie`, { params: { api_key: API_KEY, query: searchKey, }, }) setMovies(results) setMovie(results[0]) if (results.length) { await fetchMovie(results[0].id) } } const searchMovies = (e) => { e.preventDefault() fetchMovies(searchKey) } return(

setSearchKey(e.target.value)} />
